examples.text: all the agencies understand the criticality of their IT systems to their operations
science underscores the criticality of a child's earliest years to better health in adulthood

definitions: (of a nuclear reactor or fuel) the quality or state of maintaining a self-sustaining chain reaction

examples.text: reactor 4 at the Oi nuclear power plant reached criticality on Thursday morning

shortDefinitions: (of nuclear reactor or fuel) state of maintaining self-sustaining chain reaction
